item.title: ❮ ⚙️ ⬢ ZUI For Zsh Hackers ⬢ ❯
item.description: ❮ ZI ❯ is a fast and feature-rich plugin manager for Zsh Unix shell. ⬢ ZUI is CGI+DHTML-like User Interface Library for Zsh / ZCurses When both setup, I would say - quite a strong combo. ❮ ZI ❯ is supported by almost 100 repositories, compatible with the most from: awesome-zsh-plugins. Repositories: ZI, ZUI, Issue report: ZUI Wiki + Open-Search: https://z.digitalclouds.dev/search This is a RAD (Rapid Application Development) textual user interface library for Zsh.
